name: sample-docker-app
description: A sample ActyxOS docker app that sends pings and displays them

scripts.build:image: npm run build && docker build -t sample-docker-app .
scripts.build:image-aarch64: npm run build && docker run --privileged -e IMAGE_TAG="sample-docker-app:arm" -e PLATFORM="linux/arm64" --rm -v $(pwd):/data actyx/windows-cross-builder && docker load -i sample-docker-app:arm.tar.gz
